name: Borin Stonehammer
description: An ancient and iron-willed dwarf with a steel gaze and a shield marked by age and faith, guarding the Crommers for nearly two centuries.
personality_traits: Harbors a quiet love for music
ideals: Duty: 'My shield has stood for generations. It will stand still.'
Tradition: 'There is honor in the old ways.'
bonds: The dwarven guards under his command
flaws: Won’t retire, even if it puts him at risk
Blames himself for any harm to the family
backstory: Borin served Duth II and has watched over the Crommers like a granite sentinel ever since. His devotion is both personal and spiritual.
motivations: To die with honor in service to the Crommers
To pass on his wisdom to Kaideu
To defend Moradin’s work against corruption
knowledge: The secret security features of the Crommer estate
Tales from before the Crommers were accepted in Waterdeep
The locations of hidden caches and relics
speech_patterns: Gruff and terse. Speaks slowly, with deliberate pauses.
mannerisms: Keeps hand on weapon at all times. Straightens his beard before speaking.
gm_notes: A potential quest-giver, mentor, or emergency protector NPC. If he dies, it should matter deeply to the party and the city.
